Is it difficult to trust once you have been betrayed and is lovemaking a result of emotional attachment or vice-versa? Eva Trammel and Gideon Cross are about to find answers to all these complicated questions when they meet each other and get pulled together like two magnets. All seven Books in the multi-award winning, internationally bestselling Harry Potter series, available as one download with stunning cover art by Olly Moss. Enjoy the stories that have captured the imagination of millions worldwide.
